title: Username, Full Name, Email Address, GitHub Username of the Current User
text: Username, full name, email address, GitHub username current user username tries LOGNAME, USER, LNAME USERNAME environment variables first. unset, set empty string, tries running id Unix-like systems whoami Windows. full name user, queries system services also tries user’s global git configuration. Windows, tries finding global git configuration Sys.getenv("USERPROFILE") doesn’t find Sys.getenv("HOME") (often “Documents”). email address uses user’s global git configuration. tries finding global git configuration Sys.getenv("USERPROFILE") doesn’t find Sys.getenv("HOME"). GitHub username uses GITHUB_USERNAME environment variable tries searching GitHub user’s email address. Related JavaScript packages: sindresorhus/username, sindresorhus/fullname, sindresorhus/github-username, paulirish/github-email.
